question: Which country is hosting the 2017 Asia-Pacific Economic Co-operation (APEC) summit?
explanation: The 2017 Asia-Pacific Economic Co-operation (APEC) summit has started in Danang, Vietnam with theme \"Creating New Dynamism, Fostering a Shared Future\" on November 10, 2017. The 2-day summit will gives an opportunity to tout the benefits of global free trade. The 2017 summit will highlight Vietnamese culture, as well as represent the five components, which are as follows: Dynamism, creativity, action, unity, and movement to the future.
